alert.note: Alert for Susitna Valley (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued July 11 at 1:31PM AKDT until July 11 at 11:00PM AKDT by NWS Anchorage
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 PM AKDT THIS EVENING FOR LIGHTNING FOR THE SUSITNA VALLEY... The National Weather Service in Anchorage has issued a Red Flag Warning FOR LIGHTNING, which is in effect until 11 PM AKDT this evening. * Timing...From 2 PM to 11 PM AKDT Today. * Lightning Activity Level...4 * Winds...South 5 to 15 mph. Locally higher gusts near thunderstorms. * Relative Humidity...40 to 50 percent. * Temperatures...Mid to upper 60s. * Impacts...Ample lightning could lead to numerous new fire starts. These thunderstorms are expected to be wet in nature.
info.instruction: A red flag warning means that critical fire weather conditions are imminent or occurring now, or will shortly. It is directed toward fire agencies, and through them to the public.
